name: Lick-the-Spoon Cilantro Jalapeno Aioli
author: ATB
summary: This is a versatile topping for just about anything. The flavors are bright and tangy. I have used this recipe for coleslaw dressing, topped turkey burgers, fish tacos with red cabbage garnish, and even as a dip for other Mexican-inspired dishes.
ingredients: ½ cup firmly packed fresh cilantro leaves
1  jalapeno, seeds and membrane removed, diced
¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Blend mayonnaise, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, garlic, lime juice, cumin, and salt together in a blender or food processor until smooth
Pour mixture into a bowl, cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until flavors blend, at least 1 hour
